name: adobe
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a mixture of earth and straw made into bricks and dried in the sun, used to build houses in some parts of the world: an adobe house

Add to word list
a mixture of wet earth and grass made into bricks and dried in the sun, used to build houses: Adobe houses were common in the Southwest.
